title: Our 15 Best Quick Bread Recipes
description: Quick bread is a bit of a catch-all name for batter breads that rise fast, from sweet loaf cakes to hearty soda breads and everything in between. All use baking soda or powder as leaveners instead of yeast, require no kneading or resting time, and usually bake in under an hour. Get 15 of our most popular quick bread recipes.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Our 15 Best Quick Bread Recipes By Hannah Klinger Hannah Klinger Hannah Klinger is a writer, editor, and content manager at Savory Magazine. She has a passion for helping home cooks build their confidence in the kitchen with hacks, how-tos, and guides to inspire them to try something new. She's contributed to America's Test Kitchen, Cooking Light, Food & Wine, EatingWell, and more. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on April 30, 2020 Close Credits: lutzflcat Quick bread is a bit of a catch-all name for batter breads that rise fast, from sweet loaf cakes to hearty soda breads and everything in between. All use baking soda or powder as leaveners instead of yeast, require no kneading or resting time, and usually bake in under an hour. We have 2,000+ quick bread recipes on Allrecipes, and these are among the best, including banana bread (of course) and some unexpected favorites like cantaloupe bread (yes, cantaloupe!) and Guinness bread. Bake as standard loaves, mini loaves, or muffins and serve for breakfast, dessert, or a snack. Quick bread really is that versatile and delicious. Happy baking! 01 of 15 Mom's Zucchini Bread View Recipe Save KGora The perfect way to use up your zucchini (or sneak extra veggies into a sweet snack)? Zucchini bread! The grated squash makes this quick bread moist and tender. "This is my master zucchini bread recipe," says reviewer MommyfromSeattle. How to Make the Best Zucchini Bread 02 of 15 Blueberry Zucchini Bread View Recipe Save RB46 Blueberry muffin fans will love this twist on the classic zucchini bread. A pint of fresh blueberries is folded in just before baking so they create little jammy pockets in each slice. 03 of 15 Downeast Maine Pumpkin Bread View Recipe Save Holiday Baker This spiced pumpkin quick bread is designed for a crowd: Make a few mini loaves, a couple standard loaves, or several muffins. Then give them away to friends and neighbors and get ready to be showered with praise. Get More Pumpkin Bread Recipes 04 of 15 Cranberry Orange Loaf View Recipe Save momonmama Fresh tart cranberries are the jewels studding this orange-scented loaf cake. They offset the sweetness of the glaze and add a pretty pink pop. "It should be illegal it's so good," says reviewer Lemonlush. Get a Dozen of Our Favorite Cranberry Breads 05 of 15 Grandmother's Buttermilk Cornbread View Recipe Save Grab your cast-iron skillet for this fan favorite cornbread. Serve as a side with chili or barbecue, or for breakfast with butter and honey. "My search for the perfect cornbread is over," says user Jilian. 06 of 15 Zesty Lemon Loaf View Recipe Save naples34102 Quick breads may sound a little rustic, but this bright lemon loaf cake is elegant enough for high tea. Buttermilk makes it even more tender and compliments all the citrus. "Moist and lemony and exquisitely delicious," says user naples34102. 10 Favorite Lemon Quick Breads 07 of 15 Cantaloupe Bread with Praline Glaze View Recipe Save Yes, you read that right — the melon on your fruit platter is also delicious blended and folded into a quick bread. It's one of those odd-but-delicious combos that will surprise and delight everyone. 08 of 15 Janet's Rich Banana Bread View Recipe Save FoodFan Five stars and over 8,000 stellar reviews make this classic banana bread the one to beat. Recipe creator vjonsson's brilliant twist? Sour cream that's folded into the batter for even more richness. You'll be buying extra bananas just to make this quick bread. 09 of 15 Irresistible Irish Soda Bread View Recipe Save naples34102 No yeast? No time? No problem! This soda bread uses baking soda for a quick rise and no kneading. A lighter crust and touch of sweetness make this a great stand-in for cornbread. 10 of 15 Guinness Bread View Recipe Save Dark stout beer gives this quick bread fantastic malty, caramel-y notes and a tender crumb. It's the kind of hearty loaf you'll want to slice thick, slather with butter, and devour. 11 of 15 Strawberry Bread View Recipe Save It's a New Day Packed with fresh strawberries and pecans, this sweet loaf needs no glaze or even a spread of butter or cream cheese. Reviewers especially love it as a way of using up slightly overripe or even frozen strawberries. 12 of 15 Apple, Cheddar, and Rosemary Beer Bread View Recipe Save Apple and Cheddar are a match made in heaven. Fragrant fresh rosemary makes the combo even better in this beer bread. It's sure to outshine any main dish on your table. 13 of 15 Simple Peanut Butter Banana Bread View Recipe Save "Only deviation from the recipe was sprinkling a handful of chopped peanuts on the top of the batter before it went into the oven. Texture was more cake-like rather than traditional bread-like, but plenty moist and tasty." —lutzflcat 14 of 15 Banana Chocolate Chip Bread View Recipe Save My Hot Southern Mess Chocolate makes just about everything better, especially banana bread. This loaf uses the semisweet chocolate chips you probably already have in your pantry. We recommend serving just slightly warm while the chips are still melty. 15 of 15 Cinnamon Swirl Bread View Recipe Save Think of this loaf as a shortcut coffee cake, with layers of cinnamon sugar swirled throughout the battter instead of sprinkled on top. "An absolute family favorite," says user mominml. Browse All Quick Bread Recipes Get Easy Tips to Make the Best Quick Bread Explore more: Recipes Bread Quick Bread Recipes Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
